title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: A foundational course exploring the basics of AI, machine learning, and neural networks.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: An in-depth study of data organization and problem-solving techniques in computer science.

title: Web Development Basics
description: Learn how to build dynamic and responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Database Management Systems
description: An overview of relational databases, SQL, and database management systems.

title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Covers the basics of network security, cryptography, and risk management.

title: Operating Systems Concepts
description: Study the fundamentals of operating systems, including memory management and process scheduling.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Learn basic machine learning algorithms and their applications.

title: Mobile Application Development
description: Develop mobile apps using frameworks like React Native or Flutter.

title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Explore cloud platforms, virtualization, and cloud service models.

title: Introduction to Data Science
description: Learn how to analyze data using Python and statistical techniques.
